import React from 'react' import {Formik,Form,Field,ErrorMessage} from 'formik' import * as yup from 'yup' import './css/input.css' function insert(){ initialValue={ title:'', description:'', username:'' } onSubmit=(data)=>{ console.log(data) } const validationSchema=yup.object().shape({ title : yup.string().required(), description :yup.string().required, username : yup.string().min(5).max(10).required }) return(
) } export default insert
